DataSource.default.datasource.name: DataSource.default.datasource
DataSource.default.datasource.help:
Driver - the name of a supported driver; valid options are as follows:
Database/Mysql - MySQL 4 & 5
Database/Sqlite - SQLite (PHP5 only)
Database/Postgres - PostgreSQL 7 and higher
Database/Sqlserver - Microsoft SQL Server 2005 and higher
Database/Oracle - Oracle 8 and higher
Database/No - No database, this should not be used beyond setup

DataSource.default.persistent.name: DataSource.default.persistent
DataSource.default.persistent.help:
Persistent - true / false
Determines whether or not the database should use a persistent connection

DataSource.default.host.name: DataSource.default.host
DataSource.default.host.help: Host - the host you connect to the database. To add a socket or port number, use 'port' => #

DataSource.default.password.name: DataSource.default.password
DataSource.default.password.help: The password for the production database

DataSource.default.database.name: DataSource.default.database
DataSource.default.database.help: The name of the production database

DataSource.default.prefix.name: DataSource.default.prefix
DataSource.default.prefix.help: Prefix: Uses the given prefix for all the tables in this database. This setting can be overridden on a per-table basis with the Model::$tablePrefix property.
